posts.postText: I'm gonna cut to the chase, from October 7th, to October 14th I will be gone. Visiting family in another state. I'll be on my laptop, so I CAN connect to steam at times, but no games except for TF2, which is the only game I have on my laptop. I won't be gone long NNJG! And when I get back, expect me to be more active on gmod.
thats cool i mean considering ive been gone a while too

My hand is a dolphin.
Oh wait, this isn't the spam box.

Bye punk.

Well, I got my dates wrong, by a decently big margin. I'm leaving the 9th, and getting back the 12th. So I won't be gone nearly as long as I thought.

Sorry for double post but an update:

Well, my plane didn't crash, so that means I made it to my relatives house! I'm on my laptop right now, which I only have tf2 and minecraft on it, soo there's that.
